publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1661 Jamie Hepburn: Zimbabwe Vigil in Glasgowâ€”That the Parliament sends its support to the organisers of a regular vigil in Glasgow to protest against human rights abuses in Zimbabwe; regrets the continuing food shortages, monetary crisis and political instability in Zimbabwe, ahead of national elections on 29 March 2008, and believes that people across Scotland should show support for the vigil as a means of showing solidarity with people in Zimbabwe and expressing desire for a peaceful and democratic end to the crisis.
S3M-1661 Zimbabwe Vigil in Glasgow (lodged on 28 March 2008) Michael Matheson*

S3M-1661 Zimbabwe Vigil in Glasgow (lodged on 28 March 2008) Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christine Grahame*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-1661 Zimbabwe Vigil in Glasgow (lodged on 28 March 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-1661 Zimbabwe Vigil in Glasgow (lodged on 28 March 2008) Aileen Campbell*
